review.title: “Great Place to Work”
review.pros: Pros – Relaxed, goal oriented organization. Employees are dedicated and highly professional. The jobs that they secure are varied and represent the full specturm of the planning field.
review.cons: Cons – Small firm which allows a wide range of opportunities and experiences, but it doesn't allow you to concentrate on just one topic or project.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The management team is highly professional with a wide range of experience in city planning throughout the western part of the United States.
